item.title: Azure AD : PRT, PRT Cookie and Application Token
item.description: 1. PRT / Session key & PRT Cookie : Quick recap WARNING : This is only an attempt to make a quick summary of the PRT / PRT Cookie mechanism (in order for me to understand it properly) based on some amazing blog post such as jairocadena or microsoft WARNING 2 : As the AzureAD device joining process is not the purpose of this article, I can only urge you to read some amazing blog post about it such as this one
